Class SelectionController

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo1.SelectionController
public class SelectionController extends Object
This class will run the Model Selection GUI

  • Method Details

    • backButtonOnAction

      protected void backButtonOnAction()
      This method is invoked when the "back" button is being clicked. It will lead the user to menu scene

    • Search

      public void Search()
      This method provides search functionality for users to search the unselected model list and selected model list

    • selectAllButtonOnAction

      protected void selectAllButtonOnAction()
      This method is invoked when the "select all" button is being clicked. It will make all the unselected model to be selected

    • remove

      public void remove()
      This method is to clear the search bar text field

    • initialize

      private void initialize()
      This method initialize the program data for model selection GUI

    • SetSceneOnCentral

      protected void SetSceneOnCentral(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      This method takes the stage and set the stage to the central based on user's scene size
      Parameters:
      stage - the stage the users want to set at the central

    • SelectOnDoubleClick

      protected void SelectOnDoubleClick()
      This method will be invoked when user double-clicking the row on the unselected table the row that is being double-clicked will be selected

    • DeleteOnDoubleClick

      protected void DeleteOnDoubleClick()
      This method will be invoked when user double-clicking the row on the unselected table the row that is being double-clicked will be deleted.

    • DeleteAllOnAction

      protected void DeleteAllOnAction()
      This method is invoked when the "delete all" button is being clicked. It will make all the selected model to be unselected
